New Records: Naseem Shah hit two straight sixes in the last over to snatch victory for Pakistan from the jaws of defeat and put his side in the final of the ACC T20 Asia Cup.
Key Match Events: Iftikhar Ahmed (30) and Shadab Khan (36) added 42 runs to put Pakistan back on track.
Naseem Shah clubbed the first two deliveries of the 20th over by Fazalhaq Farooqi for maximums.
Pakistan bowlers choked their opponents with accurate, intelligent and quality bowling, conceding 92 in the remaining 96 balls as Afghanistan finished at 129 for six in 20 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan’s victory means Thursday’s match between Afghanistan and India, and Friday’s fixture between Pakistan and Sri Lanka are now irrelevant.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan record 14th win in 17 matches in the past 12 months.
Afghanistan batters collapsed like a house of cards, slipping from 78 for two to 104 for six before finishing at 129 for six.
Others: Shadab Khan was awarded the Player of the match award.
